string.name: permissions_head
string.b: KIX uses the following permissions to enhance learning experience:

resources.string:
LOCATION: Customize content for region

STORAGE: To save the content and enable offline access

RECORD_AUDIO: Using speech recognition for advanced 
 reading exercises
Check your wifi is connected to Pratham Kolibri !
Is there tarmac/all weather road leading to the village?
Is there public transport facility available to the village?
Does the village have electricity connection?
Does the village have any government/public health facility?
Does the village have any private health facility?
Does the village have any pre-primary schools or any school offering pre-primary grades/classes?
Does the village have any schools offering primary grades/classes (definition of primary grades would vary from country to country, so select accordingly. Eg. in India primary grades are 1 to 5)
What language do you speak at home, most often with your children?
What is the source of lighting regularly used in the household
What is the source of drinking water used regularly in the household
Atleast one member (other than the child\'s parents) who has completed high school diploma?
Any reading material other than school textbooks and religious books.
Is child currently enrolled in any school or preschool?
What is the current status of the school?
Is [test lang] the official medium of instruction in this school? (for younger children, perhaps you can check their school textbooks/worksheets/activity sheets to confirm)
School is open and teaching-learning activities are being conducted for this class
School is open but no teaching-learning activities are being conducted
What kind of activities are being conducted?
Online/Remote only (via zoom, WhatsApp, Google Meet, SMS etc.)
Physical/in-person activities only (child goes to school to attend classes)
Does child have textbooks for the current grade?
Was child ever enrolled in school?
What was the main reason child dropped out?
No school available nearby for the next grade
Was child ever enrolled in a pre-primary/nursery class?
Does child take any paid tuition class (coaching) currently?
Has the mother ever attended school?
Has the father ever attended school?
Does the mother have an income generating work/job?
Does the father have an income generating work/job?
Agricultural or related work that is family/self owned
Agricultural or related work that is owned by someone else
Non-agricultural work in a family/self owned enterprise
Non-agricultural work in an enterprise owned by someone else
Do you want to Start Assessment?
Do you want to goto the next task?
Are you sure you want to exit?

string-array.name: student_dropoutclass
string-array.item: Last grade/class completed before dropping out
